From the Desk of Justia

Justia Legal Resources: Medical Malpractice Law Center

Mistakes by healthcare providers can cause serious and lasting harm. A patient considering legal action should understand the basics of what this involves. The Medical Malpractice Law Center at Justia provides a useful overview.

Chris Skelton | June 18, 2024

Logic for Lawyers: Crafting Persuasive Legal Arguments

It’s in the core of your job as a lawyer to be persuasive so you may think you’ve got your legal arguments down and there’s no need for improvement, but what if you can take your good legal arguments and make them great? Don’t miss this opportunity to learn some tips and tricks to give you that winning, persuasive edge in the courtroom!

Justia Team | June 17, 2024

Your Bar License Is Trapped in the 20th Century. Or Is It?

Are you feeling trapped by outdated bar license rules and regulations? With the movement to change Rule of Professional Conduct (RPC) 5.5, you might finally find a way out of the hassle of navigating it all and in a new era of making your bar license as mobile as possible!

Justia Team | June 12, 2024

Meet Our Team

Our CEO Tim Stanley spoke at the CALI Conference in Seattle last month about artificial intelligence & free law and how emerging technologies affect the information landscape.
